remarks: Value of composition of translations in a trace-preserving endomorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendof.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendof.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendof.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendovalco $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H /\ S e. E ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) ) -> ( S ` ( F o. G ) ) = ( ( S ` F ) o. ( S ` G ) ) ) $.
